data.title: Sound of Your Stay®
data.meta_description: Bring the music with you everywhere you are thanks to our Hard Rock brand Sound of Your Stay programs.
data.text:
The Sound of Your Stay®Music Done Your Way

At Hard Rock Hotels, we know that music is life, and we infuse that life into every experience you’ll have as our guest. From the carefully curated Tracks® playlists following you around your room to the legendary jam sessions you’ll have with your very own guitar, we make musical memories on the daily.

Wax.®GET YOUR GROOVE ON

Wax® offers guests the opportunity to tune in to the vinyl resurgence and experience music as it was intended to be listened to. Hard Rock has amplified the in-room listening experience by offering a turntable, over-ear premium acoustic headphones, and a curated collection of vinyl chosen by Hard Rock’s team of music experts. The wax experience will keep the records spinning as guests find their groove.
